articles.title: Apple burning bridges with the developers Vision Pro really needs - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple’s “malicious compliance” with Europe’s Digital Markets Act (DMA) is burning bridges with the very people the company needs to...
articles.content:
Apple’s “malicious compliance” with Europe’s Digital Markets Act (DMA) is burning bridges with the very people the company needs to make Vision Pro a success, argues a new editorial.
